meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to resist something.
meanings.sent1: Her resistibility to temptation was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The material's resistibility to water made it ideal for outdoor use.
meanings.sent3: His resistibility to staying up late was tested during the sleepover.
meanings.sent4: The fortress's resistibility to enemy attacks was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's resistibility to mind control saved the city from disaster.

meanings.definition: The ability to withstand or oppose something.
meanings.sent1: The tree's resistibility against strong winds was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: His resistibility to peer pressure helped him make wise decisions.
meanings.sent3: The resistibility of the umbrella to heavy rain was put to the test.
meanings.sent4: The team's resistibility to defeat inspired them to keep fighting.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor had incredible resistibility against enemy swords.
